---
title: "add_header_left"
output: 
  pdf_document:
    keep_tex: true
---

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

mtcars[1:10, 1:6] %>%
  kable("latex", booktabs= T) %>%
  # kable_styling(latex_options = "striped") %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a%" = 3, "b" = 3)) %>%
  add_header_left(c("a%" = 3, "b" = 7), "new") %>%
  add_header_left(c("a" = 4, "b" = 6), "new2") %>%
  group_rows("aasd", 4, 6)
  
```
